column3: 2015 mr. glenn m. manning sr. age 86 of warrior passed away saturday june 20
column4: 2015 at his residence. graveside services will be held tuesday june 23
column5: 2015 at the mt. zion cemetery in corner at 11 am. there will be no visitation. mr. manning is survived by his wife theo creel manning of warrior al. preceding him in death is his son glenn m. manning jr. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
